extendedInfo.description: This little app provides a quick and simple way to keep your device's screen on, so you don't have to keep touching the screen to prevent the screen from going off.  This app has 3 modes to keep the screen on:1.	Use System Setting â Restore to your device's system setting screen timeout value.2.	Until I turn off â Keep the screen on until you turn off the phone or put the phone on sleep.3.	Keep on for the desired period of time.This app also has the following features:-	Run as a Service for quick and easy access from any other apps.-	Display a notification icon on top to indicate how long the screen has been on (Until I turn off mode) or how long the screen will be on (Keep on for next â¦ mode).-	An option to keep the screen on but also dim the screen.-	This is an Ad-supported app.To stop running as a service â 1) Select "Use System Settings", 2) Uncheck the "Run as a Service for quick access", and 3) Click on OK.This app uses the following permissions:-	System Wake Lock: To prevent the screen from turning off.-	Internet access â To support ads.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Been using different one, but kept forgetting to restore to short timeout. This one solves the problem. I\'ll probably get paid version.
reviews.author: Piotr Zytkiewicz

reviews.comment: Ads
reviews.author: Tam Bui

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works great!!  Simple to use and much better than the other app, Screen On...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than the system settings
reviews.comment: For some reason my phone forgets any screen system settings, so it always turned off after 15 seconds. This spiffy little app fixes that with one click. Highly recommended for all users.
reviews.author: Bryan Waugh

reviews.title: Does as it says, easily set.
reviews.comment: I never need to change my settings. After phone has been off for an apt or such, then I simply tap the icon, tap \"stay on until it\'s turned off\" or something close to that. It stays on however user wants to set it to work. I\'ve tried some competitors but this is THE WINNER & I\'m not related to person who developed the app.
reviews.author: Sandra Williamson

reviews.title: A working app finally
reviews.comment: It works and is easy. I had to push 2 buttons and now my screen finally stays awake. And the best part, is that the options make it like the older system options of the 3g phones. It stays awake, but when you shut the screen off it stays off. Perfect. But I would like for it to not to have a notification bar thing. So it doesn\'t stay In the notification bar and just be used as a system option.
reviews.author: Stephen O\'Ryan

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good app but can\'t understand the background service? I keep having to go in and out the app to start and stop. And don\'t really like having the big icon in notification but it\'s better than the others i\'ve tried thanks dev\'s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app with nuisance
reviews.comment: Does everything I want, but the ad setup is annoying. They don\'t always show. But when they do there\'s a delay. So right when you go to tap the okay button, the ad slides up so you hit that instead and your browser opens. Very clever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, effective, brilliant (or dim)
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, a way to keep the screen on, but don\'t run the risk of forgetting it on indefinitely. The timer function is exactly what I wanted.  I use it when waiting for replies in WhatsUp or SMS while my phone sits on my desktop connected to the charger. This way, it says on for the period of time I told it to, then it reverts back to system settings.  Thanks of a great and simple app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Not bad, does the job, but the ads suck. Wth happened with all the devs? Every single app is full of this trash.
reviews.author: Ond\305\231ej Hru\305\241ka

reviews.title: Just Ok
reviews.comment: Found another app that does have the annoying screen w pesky add popup
reviews.author: Rebecca Bennett

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Since google doesn\'t give you a front widget to control time outs with a single touch, you have to  dig 3  levels to get there. This app makes it easy
reviews.author: Fendero Rede

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: William Thomas

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I installed this in the hope it would stop my screen going off during calls. There is the option to select the dialer, but it makes no difference, the screen still times out as normal.
reviews.author: Steve Robinson

reviews.title: Works on Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Does as it says. First app of this type that works on the S3.  Seriously needs to be in the form of a widget - dev, please consider.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow, it actually works
reviews.comment: I tried 5 of these things, motion and touch sensors to get my phone screen to stay on while placing calls.  None worked as stated.  the toggle is now on my home screen
reviews.author: JOHN WALKER

reviews.title: Won\'t turn off
reviews.comment: I followed all the directions, and app would not turn off. Had to uninstall.
reviews.author: Anna Williams

reviews.comment: Awesome very good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the icon.
reviews.author: dean brown

reviews.title: Make a paid version with no ads please!
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this app. Only getting a 4 star because I HATE ads. Make a paid version with no ads for $1-2 and I will be your first customer.
reviews.author: John Blair
